Company Overview

[cite_start]GPSS takes immense pleasure in introducing itself as a well established trading and contracting company located in the industrial city of Al Jubail, Saudi Arabia. [cite: 624]

[cite_start]We are one of the top suppliers of Al Jubail offering our services to the Oil, Gas, Petrochemical, Electro mechanical, marine engineering and associated engineering industries. [cite: 625]

[cite_start]GPSS has a team of qualified, well experienced technical staff who provide cost effective solutions to customers' needs, offering high standard material in the best possible time. [cite: 626, 627]
